name: Game a Week 02_Ricochet
description:
Feel free to leave comments and feedback. Critique is very appreciated!Read Postmortem--Synopsis--

An actiony arcadey score attack game where you ricochet off environmental hazards and enemies in order to position yourself to explode and destroy them. This is my second game created for the game a week challenge and is not in a completed state.

--Known Issues--

-Occasionally player gets stuck in the air but this can be fixed by respawning with the R key

--Controls--

Left and Right Arrow: Moves the player left and right while on ground

Space while Grounded: Makes character jump; Can be held to charge for further jump

Space while In Air: Make character explode, damaging enemies in vicinity

R key: Respawns player at respawn point; Used when character gets stuck in air
